properties.description: Acyclica Inc. provides traffic information for both real-time and historical analytic applications.  As a company we focus on collecting complete congestion information, including travel-time and intersection delay, on surface streets and highways to help drivers get where they are going faster and easier.  Acyclica is dedicated to improving the quality of people's lives by reducing the time they wait in traffic.  We aggregate traffic Big Data and distill actionable information for the private and public sectors.
properties.name: Acyclica
